name: Apocalypse (Showcase)
description: Apocalypse is a showcase for a first person shooter, built entirely by one developer. Focusing on wave based survival with two modes, several maps, and a small tutorial mission included. Now with 5 supported platforms currently available on Steam.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD FX 6350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 770 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Mono or Stereo Additional Notes: 32 Bit and 64 Bit Supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Mono or Stereo Additional Notes: Vulkan API Supported
